bibl.title: Perspectives on Panopolis: An Egyptian Town from Alexander the Great to the Arab Conquest. Acts from an International Symposium Held in Leiden on 16, 17 and 18 December 1998. (Papyrologica Lugduno-Batava. XXXI.)

EGBERTS A., B.P. MUHS and J. VAN DER VLIET (Edd.), Perspectives on Panopolis: An Egyptian Town from Alexander the Great to the Arab Conquest. Acts from an International Symposium Held in Leiden on 16, 17 and 18 December 1998. (Papyrologica Lugduno-Batava. XXXI.)
Leiden, E.J. Brill, 2002, 4°, xix-273 pp., tabl., fac-sim., figg., plans et 9 pll. ISBN 90-04-11753-9. €119.
